title: Did you join offline coaching or self-study? If self-studying, which study material and how did you study? - Quora

response.answer_text: So basically, I have tuitions but due to the lockdown, they have gone online, plus i have my seperate school online classes too, so i would say that this is a kind of mixed study routine, and when i do self-study, i read the chapter 2 times, note down some important points and start solving question banks. I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND YOU TO NOT WASTE MONEY ON GUIDES AND RATHER STUDY ON YOUR OWN WITH HELP FROM SCHOOL AND TUITION IF YOU GO, AND YOU SHOULD RATHER BUY QUESTION BANKS FOR PRACTICE. i would suggest oswaal.
